summary.span: 沿著一組 繪製 屬性的值。

span.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要畫面格動畫的目標值會由其屬性，其中包含的集合物件。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每個定義區段的與它自己的目標動畫和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 動畫執行時，執行時從一個索引鍵值到下一個在指定索引鍵的時間。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三種類型的類別，一個用於每個支援的內插補點方法： ， ，和。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 不同於、可以有兩個以上的目標值。Unlike a , a can have more than two of target values. 您也可以控制個別的插補方法區段。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

span.span: Adds a text string as a child of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不接受文字做為子系，因此這個方法會引發`InvalididOperationException`除非在衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

exception.span: 不接受文字做為子系，因此除非衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為，否則該方法會引發這個例外狀況。

span.span: A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

summary.span: 傳回這個執行個體的可修改複製品 (Clone)。

span.span: Returns a modifiable clone of this instance.

returns.span: 這個執行個體的可修改複製品。

span.span: A modifiable clone of this instance.

returns.span: 傳回的複製品實際上是目前物件的深層複本 (Deep Copy)，儘管出於改善效能的目的，部分複製可能會延後。

span.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object, although some copying might be deferred until necessary for improved performance.
The copy's property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。The method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承方法以提供強類型的實作。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited method to provide a strongly typed implementation.

summary.span: 將這個執行個體製作為所指定 物件的複製品。

para.span: 子類別應該覆寫這個方法，如果它不會公開透過相依性屬性的資料，或者在建構期間執行額外工作。

span.span: A subclass should override this method if it has data that is not exposed via dependency properties or it performs extra work during construction.

para.span: 預設實作會複製所有可寫入、 未凍結的本機設定的屬性。

span.span: The default implementation makes clones of all writable, unfrozen, locally set properties.

para.span: 請注意，會複製屬性的基底值，不是其目前的值。

span.span: Note that the properties' base values are copied, not their current values.

para.span: 預設實作不會複製唯讀相依性屬性或已凍結的值。

span.span: The default implementation does not clone read-only dependency properties or frozen values.

para.span: 如果您不要覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫實作。

span.span: If you do override this method, you must call the implementation.

summary.span: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值 (由 執行個體所決定)。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

summary.span: 取得值，指定動畫是否將其輸出值加到所要繪製之屬性的基底值。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.

value.span: 如果動畫會將它的輸出值加至正在建立動畫之屬性的基底實值上而不是取代該值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, .
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否在動畫重複時累加動畫值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果當動畫的 屬性造成動畫重複其簡單的持續期間時，要往上累加動畫的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，動畫之輸出值只會累積時的動畫屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不會累積它的值因為重複其父代重新啟動時，或它的時鐘已重新啟動從呼叫。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call.
